title: 多重ループ3
question: ???に入るのはなに
source:
<color=#da70d6>#include</color> <color=#ce9178><stdio.h></color>

<color=#358cd6>int</color> main<color=#ffd700>(</color><color=#ffd700>)</color>
<color=#ffd700>{</color>
  <color=#358cd6>int</color> list<color=#ffd700>[</color>3<color=#ffd700>]</color><color=#ffd700>[</color>3<color=#ffd700>]</color> = <color=#ffd700>{</color>
    <color=#ffd700>{</color>0,0,0<color=#ffd700>}</color>,
    <color=#ffd700>{</color>0,0,0<color=#ffd700>}</color>,
    <color=#ffd700>{</color>0,0,0<color=#ffd700>}</color>
  <color=#ffd700>}</color>;
  <color=#358cd6>int</color> i,j;
  <color=#c586c0>for</color><color=#ffd700>(</color>i = 0;i < 2;i++<color=#ffd700>)</color><color=#ffd700>{</color>
    <color=#c586c0>for</color><color=#ffd700>(</color>j = 0;j < 2;j++<color=#ffd700>)</color><color=#ffd700>{</color>
      <color=#358cd6>int</color> value = list<color=#ffd700>[</color>i<color=#ffd700>]</color><color=#ffd700>[</color>j<color=#ffd700>]</color>;
      list<color=#ffd700>[</color>i + 1<color=#ffd700>]</color><color=#ffd700>[</color>j<color=#ffd700>]</color> = value + 1;
      list<color=#ffd700>[</color>i + 1<color=#ffd700>]</color><color=#ffd700>[</color>j + 1<color=#ffd700>]</color> = value + 1;
      list<color=#ffd700>[</color>i<color=#ffd700>]</color><color=#ffd700>[</color>j + 1<color=#ffd700>]</color> = value + 1;
    <color=#ffd700>}</color>
  <color=#ffd700>}</color>
  <color=#c586c0>for</color><color=#ffd700>(</color>i = 0; i < 3; i++<color=#ffd700>)</color><color=#ffd700>{</color>
    <color=#c586c0>for</color><color=#ffd700>(</color>j = 0; j < 3; j++<color=#ffd700>)</color><color=#ffd700>{</color>
      printf<color=#ffd700>(</color><color=#ce9178>"%d "</color>,list<color=#ffd700>[</color>i<color=#ffd700>]</color><color=#ffd700>[</color>j<color=#ffd700>]</color><color=#ffd700>)</color>;
    <color=#ffd700>}</color>
    printf<color=#ffd700>(</color><color=#ce9178>"
"</color><color=#ffd700>)</color>;
  <color=#ffd700>}</color>
<color=#ffd700>}</color>
